mainText: The text to be displayed in the main area

button1.text: The text to be displayed in the first (top left) button
button1.dest: The file name we should travel to when this button is clicked

button2.text: The text to be displayed in second (top right) button
button2.dest: The file name we should travel to when this button is clicked

button3.text: The text to be displayed in third (bottom left) button
button3.dest: The file name we should travel to when this button is clicked

button4.text: The text to be displayed in fourth (bottom right) button
button4.dest: The file name we should travel to when this button is clicked
